ygData.subject: Re: 1 Handed Magic Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Mace is a normal weapon that can be found in lower Guk off a level 40+ mob. I can not remember the name off the mob but the chances of getting this
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] 1 Handed Magic Weapons
>Date: Fri, 14 May 1999 10:28:17 -0400
>
>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>Hi again,
>
>As this Emameled Black Mace is new to me can you tell me if this is a quest
>item or if it is an item dropped by a certain beast? I do not know anyone
>with it so I am a bit curious on how to aquire it.
>
>Lady Bree Nightingale of Mercenaries of Doom
>27th circle
>Fennin Ro


The Mace is a normal weapon that can be found in lower Guk off a level 40+
mob. I can not remember the name off the mob but the chances of getting this
mace is right up there with JBOOTS & Black Iron Crown. My buddies camped
Lower guk for 5 days straight and only got 1, so it pretty rare. This weapon
is awesome, i am doing 18 damage once in a while because my 1handed skill is
going up fast, over 130 now, not to mention that it has a speed of 28 which
kicks and 1 handed blunt i have seen by far. If anyone has anymore questions
please ask.
